name: Alliance for Manufacturing and Technology
overview:
The Alliance for Manufacturing and Technology is a private, non-profit organization, part of a statewide network of Technology Development Organizations (TDO’s) and a nationwide network of Manufacturing Extension Partnership (MEP) centers in more than 400 locations, with the primary mission of increasing the growth and profitability of new technology businesses and established manufacturing and technology businesses. They accomplish this mission by providing services in the areas of ISO9000, Business Assessments, Strategic Management, Lean Manufacturing, Marketing Assessment tools, grant assistance, Venture Capital connections, workshops and seminars.

Serves Broome, Chemung, Chenango, Delaware, Otsego, Schuyler, Steuben, Tioga, and Tompkins Counties of New York State.
